elements.text: You have been hanging out with a cute coworker a lot lately, but aren't sure if your attraction is reciprocated. Today your coworker asks for your number. Your coworker will probably use your phone number to ask you about..

elements.name: Texting Your Crush_Romantic Relationships_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
